xml:
<xml xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
  <block type="board" id="LinidH9BkN,bF}{qn~yU" x="213" y="-212">
    <field name="type_">usb</field>
    <statement name="callbacks_">
      <block type="controls_loop_forever" id="NbEUNBREw1Bn(-n;)l8z">
        <field name="async">FALSE</field>
        <statement name="do_">
          <block type="bit_button_event" id="iwf1PGod]8UYUyGzFv2^">
            <field name="var_">_bit_btnA_</field>
            <field name="event_">pressed</field>
            <statement name="do_">
              <block type="radio_channel_set" id="pG?^Y3TRx@tJ(9yzCH+5">
                <comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">發送廣播訊息後，才會繼續執行下方程式</comment>
                <value name="name_">
                  <block type="text" id="50.]GJk6p.m./~OR|CVd">
                    <field name="TEXT">1</field>
                  </block>
                </value>
                <value name="msg_">
                  <block type="text" id="cKqf50yxgi)~|@x!Ke~+">
                    <field name="TEXT">shryun</field>
                  </block>
                </value>
              </block>
            </statement>
            <next>
              <block type="radio_channel_get" id="f`fPH1ub}_xLn/iftXJ;">
                <comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">獨立使用，不需放在迴圈積木內，就能持續偵測頻道。</comment>
                <value name="name_">
                  <block type="text" id="r{~m!563yv@1jpph_)dA">
                    <field name="TEXT">1</field>
                  </block>
                </value>
                <statement name="do_">
                  <block type="bit_matrix_string_once" id="h8=ha!4t.B/mOGg4([IV">
                    <field name="type_">1</field>
                    <field name="speed_">2</field>
                    <comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">若選擇一次，在跑馬燈結束後才會繼續執行下方程式</comment>
                    <value name="str_">
                      <block type="radio_channel_value" id="mbS)6~0O{%hK2rm_MFz%"></block>
                    </value>
                    <value name="color_">
                      <block type="colour_picker" id="5k/ooP:yn5KZ0v|uvIE2">
                        <field name="COLOUR">#ff0000</field>
                      </block>
                    </value>
                    <next>
                      <block type="buzzer_play_music" id="%AOQ=c`3?;A^xMTHl^yT">
                        <field name="music_">m1</field>
                      </block>
                    </next>
                  </block>
                </statement>
                <next>
                  <block type="bit_button_event" id="z%=hPN2Lihn(87~EF0.]">
                    <field name="var_">_bit_btnB_</field>
                    <field name="event_">pressed</field>
                    <statement name="do_">
                      <block type="bit_matrix_off" id="VwmJ!Cc`u/Al{AY0^c,i"></block>
                    </statement>
                    <next>
                      <block type="delay" id="lqVo2~!X7q*ly%t|h+ck">
                        <value name="secs_">
                          <block type="math_number" id="wdUrH4/UWz?qAV8H268R">
                            <field name="NUM">1</field>
                          </block>
                        </value>
                      </block>
                    </next>
                  </block>
                </next>
              </block>
            </next>
          </block>
        </statement>
      </block>
    </statement>
  </block>
</xml>
